pullRequest.title: Fix Creating NOOP Tasks on SNAPSHOT Pool
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixing a few spots where NOOP tasks on the snapshot pool were created needlessly.
Especially when it comes to mixed master+data nodes and concurrent snapshots these
hurt delete operation performance needlessly. Also with cloning snapshots incoming and adding potentially more tasks to the SNAPSHOT pool it's nice to optimize a little.

commit.message:
Fix Creating NOOP Tasks on SNAPSHOT Pool

Fixing a few spots where NOOP tasks on the snapshot pool were created needlessly.
Especially when it comes to mixed master+data nodes and concurrent snapshots these
hurt delete operation performance needlessly.

nodes.bodyText: Slightly unrelated but this is all over the cloud logs needlessly (always informs about the expected index-(N-1)) and I figured it's small enough to sneak in here :)
why are we adding INDEX_FILE_PREFIX + previousGeneration here?
